strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Ensure the pickup area is well-lit to reduce visual noise and enhance object visibility.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Turn on a task light when picking up items in dim areas.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Use stabilizing tools or surfaces to reduce object movement and ensure a secure grip.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Place a non-slip mat under objects to prevent slipping during pickup.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Identify visual cues such as color contrast, shape, and position to reduce uncertainty.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Use contrasting colored containers or background to make objects easier to identify.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Adjust the grip to minimize unexpected movements or slippage.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Use a firm but controlled grip on a slippery glass container to prevent it from falling.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Check the object's position and ensure it is stable before attempting to pick it up.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Adjust the object or reposition your hand before attempting to lift it to avoid tipping.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Utilize visual markers such as lines or indicators to ensure correct lifting techniques.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Marking a spot on a shelf where a container should be lifted.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Increase tactile or auditory feedback to confirm the stability and positioning of the object.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Pause briefly while lifting to assess if the object is securely held.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Minimize external factors that could distract or mislead the sensory inputs.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Turn off noisy appliances or reduce background clutter to focus on the task.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Combine multiple sensory inputs, such as vision and touch, to validate object handling.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Use both sight and touch to check for stability before lifting an object.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Stop briefly to reassess the situation when unsure of the object's position or stability.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Pause to adjust your grip and confirm the object's orientation before lifting.
